info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24212
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24212
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.mailjet.com include:spf.sendinblue.com include:servers.mcsv.net ?all"
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"Sendinblue-code:fb7fc2e7a9fd8ee1510be13a4fad4db9"
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=XEhzh2yHlnmz4Lma2AFc5ccOF4132EGOgtce2UM78_c"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24212
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24212
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.mailjet.com include:spf.sendinblue.com include:servers.mcsv.net ?all"
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"Sendinblue-code:fb7fc2e7a9fd8ee1510be13a4fad4db9"
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=XEhzh2yHlnmz4Lma2AFc5ccOF4132EGOgtce2UM78_c"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36335
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36335
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	1800	IN	NS	ns1.dom.scw.cloud.
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	1800	IN	NS	ns0.dom.scw.cloud.

info.name: DNS DMARC - Detect
author: juliosmelo
info.description: DNS DMARC information was detected.

extracted-results: "v=DMARC1; p=none; sp=none; rua=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; ruf=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; rf=afrf; pct=100; ri=86400"
request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 16007
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 16007
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none; sp=none; rua=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; ruf=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; rf=afrf; pct=100; ri=86400"

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 41453
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 41453
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	SOA	ns0.dom.scw.cloud. hostmaster.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr. 2025061201 10800 3600 604800 3600

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43982
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43982
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed Connection: close Content-Length: 398 Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true Access-Control-Allow-Headers: DNT,Keep-Alive,User-Agent,X-Requested-With,If-Modified-Since,Cache-Control,Content-Type,Range,Authorization Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Access-Control-Max-Age: 1728000 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 15 Jun 2025 02:52:29 GMT Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains X-Amz-Id-2: txg8d586ef2b493493b9a12-00684e356d X-Amz-Request-Id: txg8d586ef2b493493b9a12-00684e356d 405 Method Not Allowed

405 Method Not Allowed

  • Code: MethodNotAllowed
  • Message: The specified method is not allowed against this resource.
  • Method: POST
  • ResourceType: OBJECT
  • RequestId: txg8d586ef2b493493b9a12-00684e356d
  • HostId: txg8d586ef2b493493b9a12-00684e356d
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
